com.risk.maputils

Class EditMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.maputils.EditMap

  • public class EditMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads a map from an existing domination map file, or if file doesn't exits creates a new map from scratch.
    Author:
    Chirag

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Map d_Map
      Map variable that will hold map data when map is loaded.

        public static void getContinents(java.util.Scanner p_mapReader)
                          throws InvalidMapException
        This Method reads Continents from map file and add it to d_Map variable.
        Parameters:
        p_mapReader - Scanner object that helps to read map file.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - if map is not valid.

      • getCountry

        public static Country getCountry(int p_countryID)
        This method gets country from d_Map.
        Parameters:
        p_countryID - id of the country.
        Returns:
        the country object for used in GetCountries.

      • getCountries

        public static void getCountries(java.util.Scanner p_mapReader)
                         throws InvalidMapException
        This Method reads Countries from map file and add it to list in Continent.
        Parameters:
        p_mapReader - Scanner objects that helps to read the map.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - if map is not valid.

      • getAdjacentCountries

        Parameters:
        p_mapReader - Scanner object that helps to read map.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - if map is not valid.

      • createMap

        public static void createMap()
        This Method Creates a new map if map is not present.

      • editMap

        public static Map editMap(java.lang.String p_fileName)
                   throws InvalidMapException
        This Method loads map and process it accordingly.
        Parameters:
        p_fileName - Filename to be loaded if already present or to be created if not.
        Returns:
        the Map object with loaded values.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - if map is not valid.
